content.detailedDescription: Was crossing rt 23 bridge and was halfway across the bridge northbound when i saw the large gray colored object very slowly headed west as if it was following along the north side of interstate 80.  the object was about two miles west of walmart.  i watched the object for 45 sec but due to its low altitude and city buildings i lost sight to it.  the object was battleship gray and i did not see windows or lights. it's flight pattern was straight.  i add that i have served in the military and have seen many types of aircraft and have never seen an object like this before that exhibited these flight characteristics.  it was not a blackhawk, chinook, air ambulance or plane from the nearby skydive chicago.  the object seemed to be bigger.
content.summary: Unknown gray object north of ottawa il

content.detailedDescription:
It began for me when i was camping alone in the forest near port renfrew, british columbia, canada in early may 2015. i have always enjoyed star gazing and love it when i happen to see a satellite or a shooting star, both with very distinctive movements in that they travel in straight lines with no suggestion of intelligent control. they're predictable, in other words. 

while standing on a dock in complete darkness i looked up and noticed a very bright 'star' in the sky north of me at about 45 degrees up from the horizon. after only watching it for less than a minute it became brighter as if coming toward me like a completely silent helicopter with a front facing light before it suddenly turned east and travelled at a consistent speed before the light disappeared.

this incident was a little odd but not jaw dropping and i've seen enough aircraft or helicopters with such lights over the years to explain it away as a turning aircraft i couldn't hear. so i continued to look up and only a matter of minutes later i saw another 'star' that was brighter than most in the western sky. there were no clouds in the sky and from where my camp was located, no sound either.

after watching it for a minute or two, the object suddenly began to slowly rise straight up. i did a bit of a head shake when it started moving, but told myself i must have been mistaken and it was a satellite and had likely been moving the entire time. then it began to...Meander...How else can i describe it? it started to meander up the sky like a bug wandering along on a car windshield. for about a minute or more it moved on purpose in a non-linear manner up the sky before simply disappearing into thin air. 

meteors and other objects entering earth's atmosphere have a clearly defined trajectories as do satellites. yes, the iss and satellites disappear behind clouds but they don't go out like a light switch, they don't stay absolutely still in the sky and they definitely don't deviate from the path they are on as if operating with some form of intelligence.

that one made me say 'huh?!' but with no physical evidence or witnesses what can i do, so i chalked it up to a one-time freaky experience. then, while at work last week, in the end of may 2015 i saw it again, twice in the same night!!

i was working at night at approximately 10:45 pm and was chatting with a co-worker when i looked up to see a 'star' moving diagonally from south to north across the clear sky. i made an exclamation and began to tell my coworker about the object i had seen while camping earlier in the month, when this object also began to meander in the same manner i had seen before! as i watched the object move in an intelligent way i urged my coworker to get his binoculars which he had in his car. when he did he did he said it looked like a red snake in the sky. i asked him to give me the binoculars so i could see it but when i reached for them and looked back, the object had simply vanished!

we were both like 'whoa' but didn't say much more about it after it disappeared. but after he had gone i happened to look up in the eastern sky directly opposite to where my coworker and i had seen the moving object to see a similar star-like object meander it's way down the sky, wobbling in the same way all the way below the horizon out of sight.

so for a second time in a month i saw the same type of star-like object meandering in the sky like no movement from any terrestrial aircraft i have ever seen. so i decided to google search terms like 'moving lights in the sky' and 'glowing orb in the sky' and 'moving stars' only to find videos of the exact thing i had seen! exactly like stars but they move like they are alive. simple as that.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: A star that was still and silent then moved like a curious bug.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was living away from home for the first time in student accommodation. i was there about a month. it was on a weekend that this event took place, and i was the only one in the apartment block who hadn't gone home for the weekend. i went out to the back garden for a cigarette and i looked up in the sky and there were a number of crafts in the sky. i counted four of them and as i looked up to my left there was another that was like the shape of a traffic cone that shot past like a shooting star. when it had passed three parallel shooting star-like objects shot through the sky at right angles to the flight path. i sat on the ground to the right at a fuel tank and smoked a cigarette. to the right of where i saw the traffic cone craft there was a silver craft which was how i describe as the shape of a modern set of bathroom scales or something, oval, and curved in the middle. it was silver and there was a bright light at the front. from where i was i could only see the bottom of this one. it was stationery in the sky and there was no indication of any propellers or anything holding it there. to the left of this one there was one that was more like a typical "flying saucer" - it was round and silver with a bit, like a bubble. on the top. it was spinning. to the right of this, on the other half of the sky, there was a cigar/cylinder looking craft. my memory of this one is the most unclear of the five, but it had lights on it also. below this one there was another saucer shaped craft. it was black and there were red and yellow lights that ran along the outside of it. it appeared to be just above the roofs of terraced houses that i could see from where i was standing. this craft was spinning, but it was also wobbling from side to side, a bit like a spinning top.
none of these objects made any noise. when i saw them at first i knew they were like nothing i'd seen in the skies before. unfortunately i didn't have my iphone on me. my initial feeling was one of peace and a sort of inner understanding. but as i sat out for a little longer and finished smoking my cigarette it began to register with me that this was absolutely not a normal experience, so i returned inside the building, leaving the four remaining objects in the sky behind me. i did this as although i have quite a big interest in ufo's and extra-terrestrials, at that time i did not want to be abducted.
content.summary: Five objects i could very clearly see from the back garden of my apartment.

content.detailedDescription: I was taken photos of an airplane, flying from the ezeiza airport, to the north. i only have seen the object in my computer.
content.summary: Ofo near a plane in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was merely photographing some cloud formations from inside my car at approximately 8 pm. i had seen some black specks in the sky but thought they were birds. after examining one particular photograph that was taken just seconds after another i saw an unusual black spot and when it was enlarged there seemed to be a domed object on an angle appearing through the clouds. there was also a dark center, possibly a domed area as well. there were no other objects in the sky such as planes or kites and the air was fairly still. it appeared as if it might rain though as there were some dark clouds in the area. this object was only seen for a brief moment as it seemed to just appear and disappear just as quickly and it really was too small to make out any details. the details are only seen when the picture was enlarged.
content.summary: Ufo seen and photographed while photographing clouds

content.detailedDescription: I was taken photos of the sunset and the airplane flying to the nearest airport of ezeiza. i have seen the object only when i put the photos on my computer.
content.summary: Oval object, near an airplane.

content.detailedDescription: I was at home, taking photos of an airplane, as usual, because i live about 18 miles from the ezeiza airport, near buenos aires. i have seen the object later, in my computer. the object is in the first photo only, so, i think it speed were to high. it looks as a big object, compared with the plane of tam airlines.
content.summary: Phantom ufo, only seen in the photo.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Not sure i can, nsa told me "watch my back"
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: All that ive seen were in years. lights craft everything about 30 years

content.detailedDescription: Boas, ã¡ jã¡ uns meses que penso em fazer isto ou atã© mesmo anos, sendo que este ano corrente 2015 foi a minha grande revelaã§ao de muitas conclusoes e teorias. dito isto tenho algum receio do que possa ocorrer daqui para diante, o que eu mais gostava que me sucedesse era poder ter acesso a testes, exames e ter acesso a poligravos, ou ate soros de verdade e tambem hipnose de anamenesia ou de regresso e muito possivelmente ate testes com leitores geijeres ou leitores de radiaã§ao, no meu quarto sim no meu quarto onde dormo e descanso de dias de trabalho. tãªm vindo de formas e apariã§oes estranhas mas usam e abusam de mim. muitas foram as frases que apagem daqui antes deste pequeno testemunho. contactem me, o quanto antes , tenho a certeza que vou ser util.Pois ã© infelizmente tive que selecionar alguns itens que nao queria, pois eu nao vi objectos, vi seres de varias formas. como tal para subemeter este testemunho tive de selecionar assuntos que nao me eram algo.
content.summary: Nao vi ovnis , vi e estive com seres que nao humanos ã© istom que quero resolver

content.detailedDescription: Me encontraba trabajando en florida viajando desde ft.Lauderdale a miami a una noche de distraccion me gusta tomar fotos de los lugares que visito a los letreros donde me dirijo no vimos nada fuera de lo ordinario dias mas tarde cuando veo las fotos ahy me di cuenta de ese objeto pense que era el cristal de la mini van asi q fui a ver a mi sorpresa no tenia nada estaba limpio volvi a las fotos y el objeto sale en otra foto pero al tomar la foto ese dia nunca vimos nada hay mas fotos ya sin el objeto asi q se que el cristal del vehiculo no era eramos tres en la mini van y ninguno vio nada solo sale en la fotos era un cellular samsumg ace 1 la foto estaba dirigida al letrero donde dice miami y no al objeto ya q no lo vi al momento me gustaria saber si de alguna manera pueden verificar y aclarar la imagen gracias espero contestacion pronto
content.summary: I was driving from ft lauderdale to miami and had my cell just for a picture never saw the object intill a saw the picture

content.detailedDescription: I had been at lac qui parle mn making a video about a previous experience from 2011. i was almost home and noticed flashing ground lights which i assumed to be the ambulance or police going out of town. then i saw a bright light which appeared to be hovering above the elevator in town, 4 miles away. i can see the elevator in clarkfield quite well at night from my home 4 miles west. the light was a tree top level. it looked to be hovering just above the elevator. my reaction was disbelief but felt it was a warning or a just letting me know that they were watching me. i parked my car in my yard and ran back with my camera but the light was gone. it was too late at night for any crop sprayer planes to be out. that would be the only thing that would fly that low.
content.summary: Driving home from making a video about a previous sighting and noticed a bright light. to the east.

content.detailedDescription: I had been at lac qui parle mn making a video about a previous experience from 2011. i was almost home and noticed flashing ground lights which i assumed to be the ambulance or police going out of town. then i saw a bright light which appeared to be hovering above the elevator in town, 4 miles away. i can see the elevator in clarkfield quite well at night from my home 4 miles west. the light was a tree top level. it looked to be hovering just above the elevator. my reaction was disbelief but felt it was a warning or a just letting me know that they were watching me. i parked my car in my yard and ran back with my camera but the light was gone. it was too late at night for any crop sprayer planes to be out. that would be the only thing that would fly that low.
content.summary: Driving home from making a video about a previous sighting and noticed a bright light. to the east.

content.detailedDescription:
As 3 e tal da tarde, eu estava a rezar em casa, e olhei pela a janela em direção do sudeste, e vi uma luz a vir em minha direção em forma de estrela, cada que aproximava-se ficava cada vez maior. eu fiquei parvo com aquilo, no inicio pensei que era o sol mas na minha casa o sol a tarde bate do lado sudoeste e aquele objecto vinha do lado oposto. depois do ocorrido não me lembro do que aconteceu depois e fiquei com um objetivo de assassinar um grupo de pessoas. eu quando vi aquilo não fiquei com medo, mas nunca ia esperar ver um ufo a minha frente como se estive-se a olhar para mim. eu não me lembro de vê-lo partir só me esqueci de tudo que e venho a seguir a isso. no dia 04\07\2015, estava a ajudar a minha mãe a entregar umas coisas e ouvi um barulho estrondoso, como se o chão treme-se também. olhei para o fundo do horizonte e vi dois objectos negros a vir em direção ao chão, um atrás do outro e depois virou rápido e fez um zigue-zague da esquerda para a direita e depois desapareceram rápido. 

eu costumo ver o vosso programa e vosso programa releva informações muito importantes para a humanidade, mas ela parece não ligar isso. obrigado pelo o fazem.
content.summary: Uma tarde estava a rezar e uma luz em forma de estrela como a vir em minha direcção, depois disso não me lembro de nada.
content.locationName: Viana do Castelo, Viana do Castelo District

content.detailedDescription: At 11pm on june 23 i drove my car to my field approach to watch the northern lights. as i watched the northern sky i saw jets and satellites flying. then around 11:30 pm i saw a flash of red fill the sky then a bright large light appeared and hovered over a mile away from me. my immediate reaction was to laugh because i was not expecting to see anything but northern lights. the light then appeared to turn east and left quickly. i drove home because i'd seen enough.
content.summary: Watching the northetn light and saw a bright light in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was at a friends house with 2 of my friends. my friends house which we were at is opposite the raf base st athan, wales uk. after leaving the house we drove parallel wth the air force base, after leaving the small town of st athan we entered the "lanes" (which is the described for countryside roads with hedgerows commonly found in the uk). 
as we passed the air force base on the left of the road entering the "lanes" car heading aprox nw there is a field which is surrounded by hedgerows, i could not describe the size of this field as i do no longer live in the uk, but it is larger than 100m2 from memory.
 in the field there was a gigantic object which was not a farming vehicle, not a plane or helecopter.
the filed was designed to hold livestock so it wasn't a combine harvester which some people may have suggested. 
the object was the width of the field, measuring aprox 5m high (floating, hovering, stationary) off the ground aprox 5-10m.
it appeared to be matt white, and there where very bright spotlights coming out at various angles, the object was shaped like a typical dimond jewel shape, upturned  with the point cut off flat edge down.
there where no military personal around, which is surprising considering that it was not even 1km away from one of the largest raf base in the uk. 

i have always wondered what this object could have been, there was no other sightings recorded or documented in the area of where my friends and i had seen it. 
i have searched the internet and i have never seen an object of the same shape, or have i ever seen anything close to its size which was "landed"

another point to make was that during this sighting i was driving the car, i was so fascinated at the time that i was staring at the object not concentrating on the road, i slowed right down but did not stop to get out and look closer, something just kept me driving. i also managed to cross my lane onto the other side of incoming traffic, but at this time of around 1am there was no other cars and i was not drunk.


the reason i have left this information here is that i want it documented as it was part of my life, i had never witnessed a flying ufo. nor was i interested in looking for x
i do believe that we are not alone, and i have ever danced been interested in conspiracy theories and other unexplained events. thanks.
content.summary: Myself and 2 friends saw a grounded ufo in a field, whilst driving home from another friends house.

content.detailedDescription:
I want to start by saying everyone should know about the existence of extra-terrestrial life......

i was watching a movie one night and i went outside on my balcony to get fresh air and looked up. i saw in the distance this dark red crimson light i yelled for my girlfriend to come see and she came over and she saw the red light it stayed their hovering for 10 seconds the startd moving north for 5 seconds then came back south 5 seconds then just dropped like a brick over top of the bay of quinte in belleville ontario i got on my bike and biked down to the site i got to the water it took me 10 minutes to get their when i got their everything was quite and dark i was looking around and then all of a sudden two helicopters {black} flew over the water and left towards the trenton airbase i got back on my bike and went back home..
          
i still cant get a full night sleep since i witnessed this
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: People should know the truth we can handle it

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work on the night shift on hwy 377 going east, when out of the blue comes this object.  i followed it with my eyes as much as i could until it was out of sight.  the object was near to the ground,200-300 ft triangle shape, with the green orb at the mast and two off-white yellow colored orbs at the rear, i could tell it was one unit because of its closeness, the moonlight on this night reflected the triangle shape, so that is why i am sure of the shape.  i've seen orbs here and there, but this just flabbergasted me.  anyways i wanted to report so here you go! :)
content.summary: I was driving to work and i saw a triangle craft

content.city: Jean, NV or Las Vegas, NV
content.detailedDescription:
Las night a friend and i were chasing a thunderstorm to try and get photos of the lightning. we are from las vegas but drove up to primm to see if we could get better visuals on the lightning storm. we got to primm, took a left once we got off the highway and drove up towards the power plant and sort of in the desert. we stopped and started shooting for a good 20 minutes. i was getting ready to quit but took a few more photos and then that's when i noticed the anomaly that appeared on the photos. i got a little frightened so i wanted to leave. it is now the night after and i was able to get my photos on to my computer to get a closer look, and now i'm more suspicious than ever. i'm not saying they're "aliens" for sure. but i am definitely not sure what i am seeing in my photos. i know what planes look like. i don't think it's a plane. i took electromagnetic fields into consideration though... i'm open for suggestions. i just wanna find out what it is and go on with my life!

thanks for your time! 
best regards!
jm
content.summary: 4 red and blue colored lights together in a straight-ish line. and in a pattern that seemed to change.
content.locationName: Jean, NV or Las Vegas, NV, Nevada

content.detailedDescription:
From sun city lincoln hills news july 2015 issue...

submitted for your information is published by this paper...

are there extraterrestrials in lincoln hills?

at approximately 11:00 pm on saturday, may 30, while i was walking my dog along perdita lane, i suddenly noticed in the western sky two luminous objects shaped like some kind of giant stationary birds with wide wingspans. neither of these objects appeared to move, although one was apparently higher than the other because of a clear difference in light intensity. fascinated and, frankly, a bit apprehensive about these strange objects, the next morning i drove out to the area where i thought these objects might have been hovering. sure enough, i found two specific locations on the 3rd and 4th fairways where patches of grass had been burned in distinct circular shapes, each patch approximately 6-to-10 inches in diameter.

specifically, these two locations were at the northeast corner of the intersection between del web boulevard and farmgate lane and at the golf cart crossing on rose bouquet lane. apparently someone had already marked these spots with white spray paint. my next step was to call a friend of mine whose career as a federal government investigator gives him much insight into dod surveillance strategies. he told me he too had seen these aerial nocturnal objects over lincoln hills. he said they might be drones sent out as test vehicles from beale air force base, which is about 8 miles east of marysville. 

so what do you think? are we being invaded by extraterrestrials, or is our federal government now using our lincoln hills community as a testing ground for the next stage in drone warfare?
content.summary: See newspaper article below....

content.detailedDescription: Late night i cracked my window to let in some fresh air, i suddenly felt a feeling of warmth in my stomach. i look up and immediately noticed one star in the sky seemed brighter than usual, i watched it carefully until i was certain it was moving in the sky doing sudden stops, small waves at an angle, then back to sharp turns. i watched it until the sun rose and the u.F.O hid behind the mountains. every night since then i look outside and see the from 9 till 2 am, they return but never land and always seem to be in the same place. they could sense my fear the first night and froze still, i could feel that they ment no harm to me and continued to move strangely in the sky. small blue burst of light and i could see small ojects leaving the craft but too small to see if they return. its july and i still see it outside every night.
content.summary: Moves in zig zag patterns slowly but can be seen by the naked eye, moves slowly and never intercepted by any aircraft.

content.detailedDescription:
For the past several months, i have been going out to my porch to smoke, instead of the inside of house. while outside, i stargaze and look at the sky. my porch is a second story balcony that is roofed, with a lip across the top, to hang plants or birdfeeders. it faces due north.I sit in a rocker to smoke, sometimes for 30-45 minutes at a time.During the several months prior to my weird experience, i noticed that there was a light far away star at about ten o'clock to where i sat and above the tree line a good distance. it was a very small feint star that would move towards the horizon, the later it was in the evening, until it disappeared behind the tree line. at least four times, during my several months, i would see a single pinpoint light flash right by that star. it would blink brightly, once and then twice, a couple of times that i saw it. i thought at first that i was seeing things until i purposely watched that star. between 9-11pm timeframe, i would catch it flash at the same place, once, sometimes twice, then wouldn't flash again. i thought this was odd, but didn't think it was anything extraordinary. my 71 year old mother sits in her recliner beside the glass doors that lead to my porch where i smoke. one night i asked my mom to come and see if it would light again, because i would see it out of the corner of my eye, flash. she came out and did, indeed, see it flash once. she made a little fun of me "watching for the aliens". i passed this off and kept going out nightly for my smoke and stargaze. i have no idea if my experience and my mom's experience on june 28, 2015, had anything to do with this. i just felt that it was odd, as the light flashed at the same place, when i would catch it blink, and then go out or blink once more, maybe a couple of minutes later. it wouldn't move like a plane on a path, or blink consistently like a tower. the star was too high to b close to a tower, anyway.
on the night of june 28, 2015, around 10-11:30 pm, i was outside smoking. my mom was in her chair and the glass door to the patio was open so we could talk to eachother thru the open door and we could see eachother through the glass separating the patio. i was rocking in my chair and saw a light, the size of a grapefruit appear on the top ledge where the plant hooks are. it was confusing to me, because it was a definite shaped light, like a flashlight beam, but could have only come from inside the apartment, due to the angle of the light. i said to my mom, you're going to think i'm crazy, but i just saw a round light on the plant hook up there". i then looked around to her, through the glass. she got wide eyed stating that she just witnessed the light flash after i said that i saw it. she said it was round and "about this big", making a round circle with both hands, about the size of a grapefruit too. she said "really, i just saw it too, it was right up there over the hook". i started to look into the apartment for anything that could have caused a reflective light. due to the lip of the edge of the roof, coming down, there is no physical way that the light originated from anywhere but inside the house and uphigh. the porch, because it was night, was dark enough, even with the curtains open, to see the light very clearly, as a separate light source from any other light that we had. at that point, my mom got out of her chair. she stepped outside on the deck and we were both standing with our arms on the railing, looking out at the stars, when an extremely bright white light came on, like someone had flipped a switch. it was about 45 degrees.....I'm doing an educated guess because i'm not that good at degrees.....It was a good ways above the tree line but not looking straight up. it was about half way between looking straight up in the sky, and the tree line. this bright white solid, unblinking light, just appeared from nowhere, not a sound. it was like a spotlight on a helicopter, but there was no craft, just the solid circle of bright light. while i was seeing it, it seemed like it was much closer than it had to have been. the light was high up, but the light seemed close to us. i know it sounds odd and i don't understand this myself. it had to have been up at least helicopter level, because i could see an object the second time it flashed.... i will get to that momentarily. what i'm saying is that it was up pretty high, but seemed to be much closer to us. we both had an odd feeling after the sighting, which i will explain as best as possible, later. the first very bright light came on, silently, and stayed on for about five seconds....It seemed longer than that....Then the light went completely out. it flashed on again, once and very bright, about a quarter the way across the sky. the night was very clear, so it didn't go behind a cloud. the second time it came on, it stayed on for 4 seconds , no sound. when it flashed off, i saw a dark object that looked like a cigar. it was a split second that i saw it and it was then gone and lighting up at theanother point straight ahead, continuing to go east, in a straight line. when it lit up, it seemed to be stationary. it lit up the second time going east, it went out and i saw a cigar shaped object.....Then it lit up in the next point, going east....About the same distance from the first blink to the second and from the second to the third. the third time it lit up, silently and stationary, it looked as if whatever it was, was lit up from the inside. it looked just like seeing a car door opened at night, with the interior light on.....Not the shape, just the lighting tone. it was far enough that i didn't see a craft, but saw what looked like the inside of a craft lit up, dimly. it lasted from 4-5 seconds and then was gone. both my mom and i were quite confused at what we had just seen. there was no sound, three times of lighting up, with the third being dimmer and from the inside, then it was gone.  we both agreed that that was something that we had never seen before and we were both a little confused. shortly thereafter, an extremely low plane, of which i had not seen before in the sky, went over our apartments from southwest to northeast, the same direction as the flashing cigar. the plane was very loud and had three rows of lights on its belly, with the middle row of lights being much longer than the ones beside it.....Like the long row of lights were along the tail to the nose and a row of lights on each side starting at the same point at the tail, but only going half way up the longer body line of lights. we had never seen a plane go so low over us and the belly was lit so bright with three lines of lights. i am not sure how long it was after the flashing lights disappeared, until the loud plane came over. it had to have been within 20 minutes, because we didn't stay out that much longer on the deck, after the flashing lights. we came in and went to our own rooms. about an hour later, i asked my mom "ok, don't laugh at me when i ask, but did you get the feeling that whatever that was, wanted us to see it and was aware of us?"  she replied that indeed she had the same feeling. it was as if the lights were high in the sky, but much closer to us. i'm sorry for this weird feeling. i'm not a crazy person and i've never had any experience before. in hindsight, it felt as if whatever it was wanted my mom and i to see them. i have sat outside, every night since, but have seen nothing. there are lots of planes that go over. you can hear them and see their red and white lights blinking, near and far. this was no plane. it was very very bright, silent and fast.
content.summary: Extremely bright white light turned on hovering in front of me and elderly mom. moved forward silently blinking 3 times, disappeared. two balls of light appeared on porch before main bright light appeared in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
For the past several months, i have been going out to my porch to smoke, instead of the inside of house. while outside, i stargaze and look at the sky. my porch is a second story balcony that is roofed, with a lip across the top, to hang plants or birdfeeders. it faces due north.I sit in a rocker to smoke, sometimes for 30-45 minutes at a time.During the several months prior to my weird experience, i noticed that there was a light far away star at about ten o'clock to where i sat and above the tree line a good distance. it was a very small feint star that would move towards the horizon, the later it was in the evening, until it disappeared behind the tree line. at least four times, during my several months, i would see a single pinpoint light flash right by that star. it would blink brightly, once and then twice, a couple of times that i saw it. i thought at first that i was seeing things until i purposely watched that star. between 9-11pm timeframe, i would catch it flash at the same place, once, sometimes twice, then wouldn't flash again. i thought this was odd, but didn't think it was anything extraordinary. my 71 year old mother sits in her recliner beside the glass doors that lead to my porch where i smoke. one night i asked my mom to come and see if it would light again, because i would see it out of the corner of my eye, flash. she came out and did, indeed, see it flash once. she made a little fun of me "watching for the aliens". i passed this off and kept going out nightly for my smoke and stargaze. i have no idea if my experience and my mom's experience on june 28, 2015, had anything to do with this. i just felt that it was odd, as the light flashed at the same place, when i would catch it blink, and then go out or blink once more, maybe a couple of minutes later. it wouldn't move like a plane on a path, or blink consistently like a tower. the star was too high to b close to a tower, anyway.
on the night of june 28, 2015, around 10-11:30 pm, i was outside smoking. my mom was in her chair and the glass door to the patio was open so we could talk to eachother thru the open door and we could see eachother through the glass separating the patio. i was rocking in my chair and saw a light, the size of a grapefruit appear on the top ledge where the plant hooks are. it was confusing to me, because it was a definite shaped light, like a flashlight beam, but could have only come from inside the apartment, due to the angle of the light. i said to my mom, you're going to think i'm crazy, but i just saw a round light on the plant hook up there". i then looked around to her, through the glass. she got wide eyed stating that she just witnessed the light flash after i said that i saw it. she said it was round and "about this big", making a round circle with both hands, about the size of a grapefruit too. she said "really, i just saw it too, it was right up there over the hook". i started to look into the apartment for anything that could have caused a reflective light. due to the lip of the edge of the roof, coming down, there is no physical way that the light originated from anywhere but inside the house and uphigh. the porch, because it was night, was dark enough, even with the curtains open, to see the light very clearly, as a separate light source from any other light that we had. at that point, my mom got out of her chair. she stepped outside on the deck and we were both standing with our arms on the railing, looking out at the stars, when an extremely bright white light came on, like someone had flipped a switch. it was about 45 degrees.....I'm doing an educated guess because i'm not that good at degrees.....It was a good ways above the tree line but not looking straight up. it was about half way between looking straight up in the sky, and the tree line. this bright white solid, unblinking light, just appeared from nowhere, not a sound. it was like a spotlight on a helicopter, but there was no craft, just the solid circle of bright light. while i was seeing it, it seemed like it was much closer than it had to have been. the light was high up, but the light seemed close to us. i know it sounds odd and i don't understand this myself. it had to have been up at least helicopter level, because i could see an object the second time it flashed.... i will get to that momentarily. what i'm saying is that it was up pretty high, but seemed to be much closer to us. we both had an odd feeling after the sighting, which i will explain as best as possible, later. the first very bright light came on, silently, and stayed on for about five seconds....It seemed longer than that....Then the light went completely out. it flashed on again, once and very bright, about a quarter the way across the sky. the night was very clear, so it didn't go behind a cloud. the second time it came on, it stayed on for 4 seconds , no sound. when it flashed off, i saw a dark object that looked like a cigar. it was a split second that i saw it and it was then gone and lighting up at theanother point straight ahead, continuing to go east, in a straight line. when it lit up, it seemed to be stationary. it lit up the second time going east, it went out and i saw a cigar shaped object.....Then it lit up in the next point, going east....About the same distance from the first blink to the second and from the second to the third. the third time it lit up, silently and stationary, it looked as if whatever it was, was lit up from the inside. it looked just like seeing a car door opened at night, with the interior light on.....Not the shape, just the lighting tone. it was far enough that i didn't see a craft, but saw what looked like the inside of a craft lit up, dimly. it lasted from 4-5 seconds and then was gone. both my mom and i were quite confused at what we had just seen. there was no sound, three times of lighting up, with the third being dimmer and from the inside, then it was gone.  we both agreed that that was something that we had never seen before and we were both a little confused. shortly thereafter, an extremely low plane, of which i had not seen before in the sky, went over our apartments from southwest to northeast, the same direction as the flashing cigar. the plane was very loud and had three rows of lights on its belly, with the middle row of lights being much longer than the ones beside it.....Like the long row of lights were along the tail to the nose and a row of lights on each side starting at the same point at the tail, but only going half way up the longer body line of lights. we had never seen a plane go so low over us and the belly was lit so bright with three lines of lights. i am not sure how long it was after the flashing lights disappeared, until the loud plane came over. it had to have been within 20 minutes, because we didn't stay out that much longer on the deck, after the flashing lights. we came in and went to our own rooms. about an hour later, i asked my mom "ok, don't laugh at me when i ask, but did you get the feeling that whatever that was, wanted us to see it and was aware of us?"  she replied that indeed she had the same feeling. it was as if the lights were high in the sky, but much closer to us. i'm sorry for this weird feeling. i'm not a crazy person and i've never had any experience before. in hindsight, it felt as if whatever it was wanted my mom and i to see them. i have sat outside, every night since, but have seen nothing. there are lots of planes that go over. you can hear them and see their red and white lights blinking, near and far. this was no plane. it was very very bright, silent and fast.
content.summary: Extremely bright white light turned on hovering in front of me and elderly mom. moved forward silently blinking 3 times, disappeared. two balls of light appeared on porch before main bright light appeared in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Around 10:15 pm on the evening of the 4th, i walked outside to have a cigarette.  we had stayed in this year rather than fight the crowds and had just put the kids to bed.  it was overcast and foggy that night, so i stepped outside and happened to look to the northeast toward thornton (i live in south-central denver) and thought, "boy, that's an odd color for a helicopter running light."  i saw a solid, stationary blue-green light about 30 degrees above the horizon below the cloud cover.  it was not strobing or flickering like a landing or running light from a helicopter or airplane, nor was there any sound coming from the object i could tell.  i estimated it was around 3 to 5 miles from me, so i found that odd as even on a night where fireworks are going off i should have been able to hear something, especially considering it was below the cloud cover.

as i watched, the light faded, slowly at first but then picking up in speed until it went out entirely.  at that point i figured it was probably just a very bright flare or firework that got hung in a thermal or something, and was about to turn around and go back inside when it reappeared in the same position.  however, it had changed color from bluish-green to bright red.  so bright it almost hurt to look at.  it then started to slowly move horizontally in the sky to my position, and that's when i called my wife outside to look, as well.  

it did this another two or three times, fading out and then coming back alternating between blue-green and red, all the while either remaining absolutely stationary or tracking a few degrees horizontally, for about a minute.  then, it dimmed somewhat and shot off to the north in the general direction of greeley where i lost sight of it behind the neighbor's trees.

i have no idea what that object was, but i do believe there was an object emitting that light.  when it dimmed, i could make out a faint outline of...Something.  there was a physical object behind this.  what it was, i can't say.  but i can most certainly tell you what it was not:

• it was not a helicopter; there was no noise nor did it move or accelerate in any manner a helicopter could.  when it took off i would estimate it went from stationary to about 250-300 knots or faster in a matter of a few seconds.

• it was not an airplane; airplanes cannot hang in the sky like that and, besides, i would have heard either a turboprop or turbofan engine.  i grew up just up the road from davis monthan afb, and have seen my share of both civilian and military aircraft.  it was not a jetliner, nor was it a c-130, c-5, a-10, f-15, f-16, or f-18.  we get a lot of civilian traffic coming over our house from both dia and smaller aircraft from centennial airport, so if it was a plane from either of those, or from buckley afb, i would have recognized it by sound.

• it was not fireworks.  unless, of course, someone has invented a firework capable of holding position, changing colors multiple times slowly, and able to propel itself along faster than most wwii fighter planes could.

• it was not a flare.  see above.

• it was not jumpers parachuting into any of the fireworks shows around town with sparklers on their suits.  at 10:15, all of the major shows had already ended.  additionally, i've seen them jump into shows before.  see flares above. 

as i said, my wife saw this as well, but chalked it up to being a helicopter or drone.  at least i know i'm not crazy, however.  i did give a drone some thought, as an aside, but discarded it for the above reasons regarding traditional aircraft.  it was, for all intents and purposes, a classic ufo.
content.summary: Color-changing light hovers over denver the night of july 4th then speeds off

content.detailedDescription: Call 6106130088 and get message i left on answering machine
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I left a message at this number i found and they told me to go to this site instead of the one i was on.. 610-613-0088 this number has my message. i'm still in shock,so is my wife and friend!

content.detailedDescription:
Three objects observed around 10:30pm july 5th 2015 near lake rathbun iowa.  the objects looked to be red in color, somewhat transparent, very high and very large.  my guess, they were 50 to 70k feet and were at least a couple of hundred feet in height.  they traveled in a triangle pattern with the following object having a white stobe underneath. two in front followed by one in the middle.   
my feeling was that it could have been some high flying observation craft with two craft being controlled by the following 3rd.  a wag. no sound...Moving west to east so may have been in the jet stream.  they seemed high enough to be in no rough turbulence. the night was very clear but it seemed you could see stars through the objects.  
very strange looking objects.
content.summary: Three huge red objects flying slowly from west to east...Way high and they were way big.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i went to a park called "noble firs" . the park is 10 minutes away from us here in beaverton, oregon. we were standing on a bridge and we noticed the lovely reflection of the trees and sky in the water below us…so we snapped a picture. 
well after we took the picture and looked at it on the camera, i noticed something strange in the pic that was still on the camera…
there in the water was an object…

i looked back down into the water below the bridge and there was not an object of any kind in the water..Only the reflection of the trees and sky…. i looked again at the picture we had just taken…sure enough there was an object in it…the object only showed up in the picture we had just taken..But not to the naked eye. i brought it home and enlarged it…and…
content.summary: My husband and i went to a park called "noble firs" . the park is 10 minutes away from us here in beaverton, oregon. we were standing on a bridge and we noticed the lovely reflection of the trees and sky in the water below us…so we snapped a picture.  wel

content.detailedDescription: I was outside during yard work as the sun was setting when i saw it on the horrizon. it looked like it was in line to head to the airport but it never moved.  when it finally left it was like it either dissapeared or got harder to see as if it was traveling away from me.
content.summary: Vehicle size unknown object on horrizon

content.detailedDescription: My husband, my daughter and her friend were all at charles mill lake in a small country town in ohio. it has a lake and covered forest camping area. it also has a beach tucked away down a long road for parking/fishing. we were walking back to our vehicles on the road through the woods and through an opening i had caught my eye to an object that was soft and dark oranges/red in color, star like object high in the sky. at first i thought it was a firework or star, but i had my glasses on and i could tell and know it was neither things. the object pulsated in a way and i told my husband and daughter to look, we all joked it was a ufo and then after a few moments of laughing, we looked back to the clearing of the trees to see it and it was gone. reading all these other sightings all over the us, we wanted to share our story, we feel weird now! we're wondering if they could see us back!
content.summary: Ufo sighted at charles mill lake, oh after firework, fourth of july 2015!

content.detailedDescription:
I left the house by the back door that gives to the parking lot smoking a cigarette. when looking skyward watched as 4 or 5 objet in heaven.
then note that when the first light appears was not normal. appears a few seconds after another following the same course other more appear and quickly pulled out my cell quickly started to make a video of what he saw but when i realized the camera is stack.  i  til i fix  of cellular samsung not 4.
i could film only one  .Disapper behind the clouds one by one
content.summary: Red lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription: 3 lights, in a triangular shape silently moved across the sky below the cloud cover for about 5 seconds the faded/disappeared.
content.summary: 3 bright orange lights in a triange moved silently near house & disappeared
